[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces”][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”16877″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_tta_accordion gap=”30″ c_icon=”chevron” c_position=”right” active_section=”” collapsible_all=”true”][vc_tta_section title=”What are the courses offered by SDBI?” tab_id=”1619865045415-439acedc-053f”][vc_column_text]School of Data Science and Business Intelligence in affiliation with Mumbai University offers the following courses –

1. BSc in Data Science and Business Analytics.

2. MSc In Data Science and Business Analytics.

3. PG Diploma in Data Science and Business Analytics.

4. UG Diploma in Data Science and Business Analytics.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Why is Data Science preferred over Engineering/IT?” tab_id=”1619865488473-db5e7488-295e”][vc_column_text]Data Science is named as the sexiest job for the newly emerging generation for all the right reasons. But what makes it being preferred over Engineering/IT is the versatile use of it in almost all the possible fields, demand of these highly skilled professionals which does not meet with the supply of the corporate world requirements and of course the salary potential which cannot be ignored. [/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Why should one enroll for a data science course at SDBI?” tab_id=”1619865806399-1d3bd0c6-65b9″][vc_column_text]The Data Science certification courses offered by SDBI are a perfect blend of theory, case studies and hands-on practice making it an adequate choice for students to get maximum exposure required to meet the industry requirements and get a kick start to their journey in the Data Science field.

The most attractive benefits of joining our institute are –

  1. Learn more than 10 programming languages.
  2. Work on exciting projects and case studies to get the maximum exposure.
  3. Be a part of the Industry connect sessions and learn from the experts.
  4. Get complete job assistance with our Placement Assistance Program.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Which are the UnderGraduate courses provided by SDBI?” tab_id=”1619865861129-6daa30f9-e6b7″][vc_column_text]SDBI in affiliation with Mumbai University provides two undergraduate courses 

  1. Degree course – BSc in Data Science and Business Analytics
  2. Diploma course –  UG Diploma in Data Science and Business Analytics

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Which are the PostGraduate graduate courses provided by SDBI?” tab_id=”1619865903485-e93bf7c0-0cc8″][vc_column_text]SDBI in affiliation with Mumbai University provides two postgraduate courses 

  1. Degree course – MSc in Data Science and Business Analytics
  2. Diploma course –  PG Diploma in Data Science and Business Analytics

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What is the salary potential of a Data Science professional?” tab_id=”1619865967633-b0473ad9-f41e”][vc_column_text]Data Science field being one of the most promising career, provides plenty of opportunities in terms of salary packages offered. According to recent reports, In India, the average Data Scientist’s salary ranges from 8L to 20L based on the right experience and the organization you are working in.

Having said that, a candidate’s salary potential always depends on their skill sets and abilities.

You can add a question – Salary expectation for a fresher?[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What are the different job roles to opt for after pursuing Data Science?” tab_id=”1619866278293-dc5098af-8912″][vc_column_text]Data Science is well known for the variety of job roles an individual can opt from after getting into this field. The most opted roles of which are:

1. Data Scientist

2. Data Analyst

3. Business Analyst

4. BI Analyst

5. Visualisation Analyst

6. Data and Analytics Manager

7. Database Administrator

8. Data Engineer

9. Data Architect[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What are the basic skills required to be a Data Scientist?” tab_id=”1619866681581-a4af7c0f-3971″][vc_column_text]Being a Data Scientist demands the following basic skills sets an individual should possess –

1. Being well – versed with programming languages like R and Python.

2. Knowledge of Statistics.

3. Advanced skills like Machine Learning, Big Data Processing, Data Visualization, etc

4. Data cleaning, structuring, and organizing.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Do you need to be tech savvy or possess great programming skills to enter the field of Data Science?” tab_id=”1619866742870-5d21d96c-1ccb”][vc_column_text]No, you don’t have to be Tech-Savvy or possess great programming skills in order to be a data scientist. You need to have a good understanding of programming languages and a good business acumen to be able to enter the field of Data Science.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What should I expect from the BSc program in Data Science and Business Analytics?” tab_id=”1619866784955-7f6b2492-5fad”][vc_column_text]As a part of our BSc in Data Science and Business Analytics curriculum, you can expect the following –

1. 3 years full-time undergraduate course.

2. Includes Mandatory Internship.

3. Industry connects sessions.

4. 10 + programming tool and languages[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What should I expect from the MSc program in Data Science and Business Analytics?” tab_id=”1619866867032-2043dbb8-83b5″][vc_column_text]As a part of our BSc in Data Science and Business Analytics curriculum, you can expect the following –

1. 3 years full-time undergraduate course.
2. Includes Mandatory Internship.
3. Industry connect sessions.
4. 10 + programming tool and languages[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What should I expect from the MSc program in Data Science and Business Analytics?” tab_id=”1619866947849-535cb99d-610d”][vc_column_text]As a part of our MSc in Data Science and Business Analytics curriculum, you can expect the following –

1. 2 years – full-time course.
2. Mandatory Internships.
3. Placement Assistance.
4. Mentorship of top Data Talent.
5. Capstone projects and Case Studies.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What should I expect from the PG Diploma program in Data Science and Business Analytics?” tab_id=”1619867001772-59f5dd8a-ada1″][vc_column_text]As a part of our Pg Diploma in Data Science and Business Analytics curriculum, you can expect the following –

1. Designed specifically for working individuals.
2. Lectures only on weekends
3. Gateway to International Studies as getting this diploma will complete your 16 years of education and academic credits.
4. 20+ industry projects.
5. Dedicated Student Mentor.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What is the admission process to enrolls for a course at SDBI?” tab_id=”1619867072290-61ae1536-351c”][vc_column_text]To enroll for a course at SDBI, follow these easy steps –

Step 1 – All the interested candidates are required to fill up an Online Application form on the website.
( Click on the register button on the home screen and fill in the details)

Step 2 – The application form then goes under review by the admission panel and the candidates are selected on the basis of their academic merit. (Candidate may have to write an entrance test – QAT depending on their marks)

Step 3 – Once selected, you can fill up the admission form of the college, submit all the documents and deposit the program fees.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Is it mandatory to enroll for QAT for taking admissions?” tab_id=”1619867167025-7afb216b-ab0b”][vc_column_text]No, it is not mandatory to enroll for QAT for taking admissions.
We follow two procedures for enrollment of students in our Data Science programs on the basis of their eligibility –

1. Enrollment on Merit Basis.
2. Enrollment on QAT Basis.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Who all are eligible for enrolling through Merit Basis?” tab_id=”1619867212997-bf602395-0f25″][vc_column_text]If a candidate has scored above a certain percentage (differs in each course), they are directly eligible for enrolling on a merit basis.

Eligibility for BSc – 75 % and above in 10+ 2 grade.
Eligibility for MSc – 60% and above in graduation.
Eligibility for PG Diploma – 50 % and above in graduation.

In case, a student’s percentage falls below the mentioned criteria bar, the student can apply for the QAT program to enroll in a course at SDBI.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What is the QAT program and who all are eligible to enroll for it?” tab_id=”1619867271770-98da02c6-a77a”][vc_column_text]Quantitative Aptitude Test is an online MCQ-based exam given by students to enroll for a Data Science course at SDBI.

Eligibility Criteria –
Each and every student is eligible to apply for QAT.

Two stances where you can apply for QAT are –

1. To pre-book your seat before the admissions begin.

2. To enroll for a course in case your percentage does not fall under the set merit basis criteria.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What is the process of taking admission on a Merit – Basis?” tab_id=”1619867361287-5ce77711-a626″][vc_column_text]To take admissions on a Merit Basis for any course, follow these easy steps –

Step 1 – Head over to sdbi.in
Step 2 – Click on the register button on the home screen.
Step 3 – Fill in all your personal details.
Step 4 – Select the course of choice and upload all the documents required.
Step 5 – Pay the program fees.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How to register for the QAT program at SDBI?” tab_id=”1619867402548-435068df-c92b”][vc_column_text]Follow these simple steps to register for a QAT program at SDBI –

Step 1 – Head over to sdbi.in
Step 2 – Click on the register tab on the home screen.
Step 3 – Fill in all your personal details.
Step 4 – Select the course of your choice and upload all the documents required.
Step 5 – Select QAT.
Step 6 – Pay Rs. 1000 for QAT registration.

Post this, you will receive an official confirmation mail from SDBI with all the further updates.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What is the registration fees for BSc in Data Science and Business Analytics to pre book a seat?” tab_id=”1619867404078-d7d28686-a753″][vc_column_text]The registration fees for BSc in Data Science and Business Analytics is Rs. 25,000 (inclusive of the whole fees amount). You can apply for our QAT program to pre book your seats before the admission begins.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What is the registration fees for MSc in Data Science and Business Analytics to pre book a seat?” tab_id=”1619867506701-88ebc808-d569″][vc_column_text]The registration fees for MSc in Data Science and Business Analytics is Rs. 25,000 (inclusive of the whole fees amount). You can apply for our QAT program to pre book your seats before the admission begins.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What is the registration fees for PG Diploma in Data Science and Business Analytics to pre book a seat?” tab_id=”1619867619457-0c8c73f2-8989″][vc_column_text]The registration fees for PG Diploma in Data Science and Business Analytics is Rs. 25,000 (inclusive of the whole fees amount). You can apply for our QAT program to pre book your seats before the admission begins.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Does SDBI provide placement opportunities?” tab_id=”1619867650138-cf4f22fd-d572″][vc_column_text]Yes, we have a 100% placement assistance clause as a part of our curriculum in partnership with our Industry-Academia placement partners to help you get your dream job.
As a part of our placement assistance program, we provide the following benefits –

1. Resume Building Assistance.
2. Career Mentoring.
3. Preparation for Interview.
4. Campus Placement Opportunities.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Is placement opportunity provided in all the courses offered at SDBI?” tab_id=”1619867710175-7d4d6464-0dcb”][vc_column_text]Although, 100% placement assistance program is designed specifically for the MSc and BSc batch, we try to provide the best of our potential for all the other courses as well.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Which is a better option for a post graduation course? Msc or Pg Diploma?” tab_id=”1619867754385-d9f038f0-14e3″][vc_column_text]M.Sc is a full – time two years degree with maximum exposure needed to excel in this industry. It is an especially designed course for the students wanting to devote their complete time towards studying for post-graduation. Also, includes an in-program mandatory internship for complete industry exposure.

PG Diploma is a full-time 1-year course specifically designed for working professionals wanting to upskill in their own industry. Flexible lecture timings are a surplus. It gives an additional one year of academic credits to complete 16 years of education to apply for international universities.

Both the degrees are offered under the prestigious Mumbai University.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Does SDBI provide internship opportunities?” tab_id=”1619867811032-7a04d5f4-2984″][vc_column_text]Yes, we have a mandatory internship clause in our BSc and MSc degree courses curriculum.
The duration of the internship is 2 to 3 months. (Can be extended if required by the company)[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Do you provide EMI or Pay In Installments options?” tab_id=”1619867837618-4ff78c6c-36bc”][vc_column_text]Yes, we do offer a Pay In Installments option for our students.
The procedure of the same is –

Step 1 – Pay a nominal amount (Varies in all the courses) and complete your admission procedure.

Step 2 – Pay your installments within the due dates given by the college ( Installments are calculated in a way that the whole fees amount gets submitted by the academic year end).

You can also opt for bank loan options and pay through EMIs.
SDBI will assist you in the documentation process.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What certificate will I receive after the completion of the course?” tab_id=”1619867873894-d2a174ca-c338″][vc_column_text]All our courses are accredited with University of Mumbai, so will you get the official degree from University of Mumbai and Patkar Varde College.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Does SDBI have a quota system for admissions?” tab_id=”1619867926039-34dae3e1-6172″][vc_column_text]No, we offer scholarships based on merit and financial aid, there is no quota system.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Is any scholarship or financial aid provided?” tab_id=”1619868064042-4491a149-9859″][vc_column_text]To ensure money is not a barrier between getting the fresh talent in our institution, we provide scholarship opportunities on merit and financial aid. The eligibility for scholarship on a merit basis is 75% and above in the previous degree exams. For scholarships on financial aid, the students are required to submit the relevant documents.
Scholarships can go upto 40% of the total fees granted based on a student’s academic achievements.
To know more about our scholarship program in detail click on the link below.
https://sdbi.in/admissions/#scholarship[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How should I apply for a Scholarship on Merit Basis?” tab_id=”1619868153545-221c8ea3-8d14″][vc_column_text]To apply for a Scholarship on Merit Basis, follow these easy steps –

1. Once the admission process is complete, the candidate is required to fill an application form to get a Merit-Based Scholarship at SDBI.

2. Attach the relevant certificates ( Merit basis documents).

3. The scholarship request then goes under review by the admission team and the revert is sent within 4-5 working days.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How should I apply for a Scholarship on Financial Aid basis?” tab_id=”1619868216314-30df218a-974f”][vc_column_text]To apply for a Scholarship on the basis of Financial aid, follow these easy steps :

1. Once the admission process is complete, the candidate is required to fill an application form to get Financial Aid at SDBI.

2. Attach the relevant certificates.

3. The scholarship request then goes under review by the admission team and the revert is sent within 4-5 working days.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”What is the selection process of the Academic Trainers?” tab_id=”1619868281229-e2f67fd9-86bd”][vc_column_text]All of our faculty members are highly qualified Data Science trainers and have relevant industry experience. Each of them goes through a rigorous process of selection from profile screening, evaluation to training demo before they qualify to be our certified trainers.
We ensure to get the corporate experts as our trainers to provide our students with the best learning experience.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Does SDBI have its own online teaching platform?” tab_id=”1619868336364-8135377b-c9a5″][vc_column_text]Yes, we have our own online teaching platform for conducting lectures.
Once a student gets admission, they receive an email with the login credentials of our LMS (Learning Management System) where they get access to the study material, online assessments, academic Timetable, etc making them highly engaged.
Our LMS is specifically designed by the dedicated team of professionals to give our students the best learning experience with all the adequate resources. It acts as a one stop destination for all the academic requirements.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How can I contact the Counsellors and admission team of SDBI?” tab_id=”1619868407624-fa7a1e85-439a”][vc_column_text]To assist all the students, we have a dedicated team of counselors always available for any assistance required by students in terms of admissions. Here are the contact numbers and email ids of our counselors –

1. Muskaan Talreja
Contact Number – +91 63929 11370
Email Id – muskaan.talreja@sdbi.in

2. Palak Mandhyan
Contact Number – 9920053700
Email id – palak.mandhyan@sdbi.in

You can also send an email to info@sdbi.in for any assistance required.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_accordion][/vc_column][/vc_row]
